an4.220:1.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an4.220:1.3: Assaddho hoti, dussīlo hoti, kusīto hoti, duppañño hoti—
an4.220:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an4.220:2.1: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an4.220:2.3: Saddho hoti, sīlavā hoti, āraddhavīriyo hoti, paññavā hoti—
an4.220:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
